title: Castaway (Live wallpaper) v2.1
description:
A beautiful tropical island with rippling water, coconut palm tree and a stranded man. 

The stranded man occupies his time with various activities on your phone.

Features:

- A stranded man on an island.
- Calculates when the sun and moon will set and rise.
- Beautiful and funny background.
- Landscape and portrait support.
Before downloading, please check if your phone support Live wallpaper.
I cannot respond on comments, please email me for support.
If anyone remember Johnny castaway this wallpaper is similar but unique in its own way.

What's in this version:

Fixed minor bugs and added new stuff.
- Added christmas and new year event
